COMMON.CAPTCHA_TITLE: Enter the characters shown in the image
COMMON.DUPLICATE_ERROR: Oops! A will has already been drafted for this identification number. If you wish to edit or download your will, please log in to your account.

SIGNUP_ERRORS.TITLE: You have an account with us!
SIGNUP_ERRORS.LOGIN_EMAIL_TITLE: Oops, verify your email to login!
SIGNUP_ERRORS.ACCOUNT_EXIST_MESSAGE: Seems like you may have an existing account with Moneyowl. Login now!
SIGNUP_ERRORS.VERIFY_EMAIL_MESSAGE: You are almost there! An email verification is sent. We need you to verify your email to complete your account creation!
SIGNUP_ERRORS.VERIFY_EMAIL_OTP: Seems like you have previously started on account but has yet to complete account verification. Let us bring  you through again!

CREATE_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Create Your Account
CREATE_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Please fill in your details so that our advisers can contact you.

FORM.TERMS_OF_USE: I agree to MoneyOwl's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
FORM.MARKETING_ACCEPTANCE: I consent to receiving marketing materials from MoneyOwl, its partners and related organisations, and to disclosing my personal data to the same.

FORM.INSTRUCTION: Enter the 6-digit OTP code sent to:

ERROR_MODAL.ERROR_MESSAGE: You have keyed in an invalid OTP Code

EXPIRED_ERROR_MODAL.ERROR_MESSAGE: Your OTP is expired. Please click on Request New Code link to get new OTP

PASSWORD.TITLE: Create Password
PASSWORD.SUB_TITLE: You may use Mobile Number / Email Address as your Login ID.

ACCOUNT_CREATED.TITLE: Account Created!
ACCOUNT_CREATED.SUB_TITLE1: A verification link has been sent to your email address.
ACCOUNT_CREATED.SUB_TITLE2: Please verify your email address before logging in.
ACCOUNT_CREATED.VERIFY_EMAIL_SUB_TITLE: We have sent an email to you. Please verify your email address to get started!

LOGIN.DESCRIPTION: Please fill in your details so that our advisers can contact you.

FORM.MARKETING_ACCEPTANCE: I consent receive marketing materials from MoneyOwl and partners of MoneyOwl.

FORGOTPASSWORD.CHECK_EMAIL: Please check your email for a link to reset your password. If you do not receive it, check your spam folder.
FORGOTPASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Enter your email to receive your password reset instructions.
FORGOTPASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot Password
FORGOTPASSWORD.EMAIL_NOT_FOUND_DESC: The email you’ve entered doesn’t seem to exist in our database. Please try again.

PRELOGIN.TITLE: Are you an existing MoneyOwl user?

WILL_WRITING.CREATE_YOUR_WILL_DESC: Write a legally-binding Will online, anytime & anywhere!
WILL_WRITING.CONTINUE_WILL_DESC: Almost there! Click on the button to complete your Will.
